product_name: GSI Outdoors Halulite 1.8L Boiler Pot - 2013 Seconds
long_description: Say goodbye to scratches, burn circles and ounces. This lightweight pot is made with hard-anodized Halulite that conducts heat efficiently and evenly, so you can leave the extra fuel at home.
short_description: Say goodbye to scratches, burn circles and ounces. This lightweight pot is made with hard-anodized Halulite that conducts heat efficiently and evenly, so you can leave the extra fuel at home.
